kernfrasen: love the life of your neighbor as though it were your own
dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: GOD IS THE HOLY NEIGHBOR / MARRIAGE IS A NEIGHBORHOOD

kernfrasen: as long as we both shall live

doeldomein.theologisch_concept: The Transcendence and Immanence of God

cognitieve_implicaties: God is part of the social fabric, not a distant ruler
theologische_implicaties: Covenantal presence is redefined as neighborly solidarity
God's holiness is expressed through generosity and forgiveness
ethische_implicaties: Worship of God is inseparable from social ethics
onbedoelde_consequenties: God becomes just another 'actor' in the neighborhood

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: The preacher re-activates the 'neighbor' concept by applying it to God, moving it beyond a mere ethical category to an ontological description of the Divine.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The preacher uses the 'Neighborhood' schema as a unifying umbrella for three distinct relationships: the spouse (supreme neighbor), the world (needy neighbor), and God (Holy Neighbor).

incoherentie_punten.metafoor_b: Society 'going to hell in a hand basket'
incoherentie_punten.conflict_beschrijving: The shift from a localized neighborhood metaphor to a globalized 'hand basket' idiom is jarring.
incoherentie_punten.entailment_conflict: Utopia implies a closed container; the hand basket implies a downward trajectory of the whole system.

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: The preacher uses the euphemism 'Recent Unpleasantness' to bridge the gap between large-scale conflict and domestic marital friction.

sterktes.beschrijving: Takes the 'dead' metaphor of 'loving your neighbor' and applies it to the spouse and God to create a fresh theological framework.
sterktes.voorbeeld: In marriage one finds oneâ€™s supreme neighbor.

risicos.beschrijving: By framing God as a 'Neighbor' who provides 'generosity and forgiveness' when the spouse is 'less than helpful,' God risks being viewed as a backup support system.
risicos.voorbeeld: The supreme neighbor... is sometimes less than helpful... and then the truth of Christian marriage is that one has recourse to that Holy Neighbor.
risicos.potentiele_impact: Congregants may view God primarily as a crisis-management resource.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: A local neighborhood where people live in proximity and share burdens.
sub_worlds: The 'Romantic Utopia' (the private world of the couple)
The 'Recent Unpleasantness' (the world of conflict and disappointment)
The 'Public Square' (the wedding as a public act)

deictic_shifts.naar_wereld: The gritty reality of Christian forgiveness
deictic_shifts.effectiviteit: High; it grounds the sermon in reality.

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: By defining the spouse as a 'neighbor,' it invokes the ethical weight of the Great Commandment.

verstoorde_schemas.verstoring_strategie: Labeling it as 'unreality' and 'therapeutic consumer society.'
verstoorde_schemas.vervangend_schema: Marriage as a generative public office.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Fits perfectly with the public nature of wedding vows.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by a 'Neighborhood' meta-metaphor. It successfully collapses the distance between the ethical (neighbor), the intimate (spouse), and the divine (God). This creates a highly integrated theological vision where the same rules of engagement (generosity and forgiveness) apply to all spheres of life.

revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Deepen the source domain by referencing the 'Law of the Neighbor' in Leviticus.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: God is the neighbor who leaves the edges of the field for the poor.

coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Replace with a neighborhood-based metaphor, such as 'the neighborhood falling into disrepair' or 'broken fences.'

entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: Neighbors can move away; neighbors have boundaries.
entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Explicitly state that this neighborhood has no 'fences' or 'exit ramps' to preserve the permanence of the vows.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To emphasize the 'generative' aspect of marriage mentioned in Section II.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in conceptual consistency. By sticking to the 'neighbor' domain, you've made a complex theological truth feel like a walk down the street.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: An aesthetic analysis would praise the 'Mr. Rogers' reference; CMT shows how that reference functions as a schema disruption to define 'real' neighborhood vs. 'pretend' neighborhood.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Kolb would focus on the 'experience' of the wedding; CMT focuses on the cognitive mapping of 'Neighbor' onto 'God'.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: CMT reveals that the preacher is not just using a 'theme,' but is actually restructuring the hearer's concept of God from 'Ruler' to 'Proximally Present Actor'.

volledige_metafoor_lijst: going to hell in a hand basket
appendices.notities: The sermon relies heavily on the cultural schema of 'The South' to introduce the 'Recent Unpleasantness' metaphor.
